description: SynchroKnit® patented contour knit creates an unrivaled precise fit. Products made with CiCLO® fibers reduce the persistence of plastic microfiber pollution in oceans and plastic accumulation in landfills. Double "Y" heel gore provides most precise heel fit.
name: Bravura Mid Crew Lightweight Socks

specs.value: 52% Hydrowik with CiCLO®, 42% Stretch Nylon, 6% Spandex
Zone Cushion - Comfort and shock absorption is knit into targeted areas, typically the heel and toe
Lightweight - Utilizes a dense but thin cushion in an area such as the heel, sole and
